body.name: JAZZCOOLING 4 Pin PC Fan Splitter Cable, PWM Fan Splitter, 10.6 inch Sleeved Braided Adapter Computer PC Fan Extension Cable Converter for Computer, 4 pin Fan Splitter, 1 to 3 (2 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【PC Fan Extension Cable】The extension cable Suit to 3pin and 4pin PC fans, extend more fans for computer case, increase airflow better for heat cooling.

【Composition Of The 4 pin fan splitter】 One side is a 4pin female connector, it connect 4pin interface on motherboard. Another side is divided into 4 male connectors, they connect pc fan 4pin header. Fans can spin at the same speed via PWM control software of motherboard.

【Black Sleeved Braiding Material】The length of pc fan splitter cable is 10.6 inches, and covered with black sleeved braiding material, effectively protection for cables and prevent from dust, it not only extend cable service life, but also looks good.

【4PIN Connect First】The side connect PC fans have one 4pin connector, two 3pin connector, please connect 4pin first. In order to avoid signal conflict, there need only one 4pin (for speed measurement and Temperature control), and other interface no need this pin, so they are 3pin. And all fans can spin at the same speed via PWM control.

【Also Suit For 3Pin Fans】The Splitter not only use to 4pin fans, but also suit for 3pin fans, like rgb fan with type-d port & small 3 pin interface, small 3pin connect the male interface then it works.
body.description: 3 Fan 4pin PWM Fan Cable Splitter The side connect PC fans have one 4pin connector, three 3pin connector.please connect 4pin first.In order to avoid signal conflict, there need only one 4pin (for speed measurement and Temperature control), and other interface no need this pin, so they are 3pin.And all fans can spin at the same speed via PWM control. Max power is 36 Watts 3pin and 4pin Fans are compatible Motherboard can support 3 pcs PWM Fans

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3-Fan Spliter Cable in a Cost-Effective 2- pack 4 pin PWM 3 way Splitter Cable take a quick solution to control 3 case fans in a computer case. Extend more fans for computer case. The side connect PC fans have one 4pin connector, two 3pin connector, please connect 4pin first, And all fans can spin at the same speed via PWM control.

3 way PWM Fan Cable Splitter (white) The pc fan splitter cable covered with black sleeved braiding material, effectively protection for cables and prevent from dust, it not only extend cable service life, but also looks good. 3 Fan 4pin PWM Fan Cable Splitter The side connect PC fans have one 4pin connector, three 3pin connector.please connect 4pin first.In order to avoid signal conflict, there need only one 4pin (for speed measurement and Temperature control), and other interface no need this pin, so they are 3pin.And all fans can spin at the same speed via PWM control. Max power is 36 Watts 3pin and 4pin Fans are compatible Motherboard can support 3 pcs PWM Fans

Motherboard Connector PWM PC fan splitter connects to the 4-Pin header on the motherboard and splits the signal to 3 PWM fans.PWM fans can spin at the same speed via PWM software control. White Sleeved Braiding Material The length of 1 to 3 PWM pc fan splitter cable is 10.6 inches.splitter cables are covered with black sleeved braiding material 3 way Fan Splitter The extension cable Suit to 3pin and 4pin PC fans,.Extend more fans for computer case, pwm fans are working at the same speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and cuts down on visual wire mess
reviews.reviewText: Adding this on my 4070ti really cleaned up the visual wire clutter from the GPU to the power supply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm no computer genius...
reviews.reviewText: This is my first custom PC. I realized too late that my micro motherboard only had two fan headers.. So here we are. Seems to work as intended. They're definitely white, as pictured, not black as described in the product description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good white fan splitter cables
reviews.reviewText: They worked well and were perfect for adding more cooling fans to my rig. They feel pretty cheaply made though.
It works as intended, but the pins are crooked and angled downward for 1/2 of the splitters. It was also hard to remove the cable after connecting it to the splitter.
